Release LTS.431.2 of September 27, 2024
New features
The setup options for
start pages
were expanded.
1. It is now possible to create a two-way connection between object attributes in different object types to establish a "one-to-one" connection.
2. As a result of updates, recalculating attribute values via
expression or autocalculation
for all object type instances is done without considering settings selected in the "Automatic expression recalculation" field. Recalculation of system expressions is also available.
1. When working with the
"Kanban Board" dashboard
, task profile display settings became more flexible, including enhanced attribute display options and improved filtering.
2. It is now possible to display analytical dashboard panels such as
"Table"
,
"Structural diagram"
,
"Dynamics chart"
,
"Line chart"
,
"Custom chart"
and "Object profile" without background or borders.
The process of configuring
Financial statements widget
was simplified, now the reporting date range for generating the table can be set automatically.
It is now possible to view the data of deleted objects in action audit.
The possibility to configure the display of additional task attributes according to the target platform (mobile app or web version) was added.
The process of saving objects in algorithms executed on the business process route was optimized. Now only the attribute values used in the algorithm code are sent for saving, not the entire object.
Viewing registries for object types whose instances are metadata is now regulated by a specific
permission
.
It is now possible to lock a part of the document text to make changes.
Access to object attribute values for users having no specific permissions is now regulated based on the configured
access mode settings
.
greendata-core:
restrictions:
obj-attr-access-mode:
strict
yaml
Copied!
The display of
visuals by algorithm
is now available in the mobile application.
Changes and improvements
The uniqueness check for creating a unique key was improved;
The System stability when attempting to open an empty file was enhanced;
In the multi-selection registry, in the edit mode, the stability of saving logical attribute values was improved;
The stability of string filters when opening the registry in a modal window was improved;
Display of data in the registry as a result of filtering and when switching read/edit modes was stabilized;
The date filtering in the
tile registry
was stabilized;
The adjustment of column widths when working with registries was stabilized;
Data merging in the virtual column of the registry was improved;
The performance when working with the registry in the edit mode and when configuring buttons in the registry control panel was optimized;
Verification of permissions to edit boolean attributes in the registry editing mode was stabilized;
Object display when working with
"Object List General" widget
was stabilized;
Visualization of
"Reactions and comments to the object" widget
was optimized and the hint for working with
"Financial statements" widget
was improved.
The display of the
"Employee information" widget
was improved;
The counter display in the
"Tabs management" widget
was debugged;
The display of the
"File hierarchy"
widget in the snapshot mode in the business process task profile was stabilized;
The stability of column display in the
"Table" dashboard
when exporting to Excel was improved;
The process of creating an object via
custom action (via a button)
was debugged;
The business process scheme configuration was optimized;
The process of clearing all business process routes was debugged;
The stability of business process signals was improved;
The calculation in days for the
"Relative Time Timer" type
in the business processes was stabilized;
For the
delete
function, the ability to delete an object using the
getObject
function was finalized;
The performance of the
getPlainObject
function was improved;
Possibility of transferring a variable as an argument to the function
attrOldValue
was improved;
The operation of the
attr
function for boolean attributes was stabilized;
The access matrix functionality and the ability to add an access group in it was stabilized;
The dynamic structure parsing process using the "XML Parsing" ETL transformer was optimized;
The process of transferring updates via guf-files was stabilized. In particular, an object that has a frame with selected attribute values on its visual, custom actions in registry settings, and customization of control panel buttons in the registry.
The ability to customize
notification template
was stabilized;
Hiding confidential information provided in logs is now configurable using
configuration file
of the logging system;
In the EDoc module, the display of a text attribute with the "Rich Text" visual format in print form was optimized for working with bookmarks in the review mode, and during document export;
In the EDoc module, percentage values are now displayed correctly when exporting a document in the version comparison mode;
In the EDoc module, the grouping of the list by instances of nested templates in printed forms was improved;
Saving the name of a previously created
call room
was stabilized;
Ability to filter data in the registry was stabilized.
Access permissions for working with the task were stabilized.
Displaying of the updated list of active tasks when attempting to delete a business process step was improved.
Working with audit was optimized, now the administrator authentication process required for various server processes is recorded in the change audit only when the application starts.
In the GreenData mobile app, the business process task profile was debugged for configuring additional attributes for transition options. The display of names in the light registry was also stabilized;
Visual of the "Relation of the document paragraphs and approving groups"[RF_PAR_CONFORM_GROUP] type was adjusted.
To ensure proper operation of full-text search mode in light and flat registries, postgresql extension “pg_trgm” was added to the System, and missing indexes “sys_au_session” were created.
